DOC.brief_summary: The aim of the present study is to evaluate the effectiveness of two different delivery formats for weight management in a managed care setting. Mail-based weight counseling and phone-based weight counseling will be compared to each other and a control condition. Primary outcomes are participation rates in programs, weight change, and cost.
DOC.brief_title: Obesity Treatment in a Managed Care Setting
DOC.criteria: at least 18 years of age BMI ≥ 27.8 kg/m2 for men BMI ≥ 27.3 kg/m2 for nonpregnant or lactating women
